There needs to be a group of the current most-voted/most-played Maps for casual that changes throughout the day based on what people are voting for, or at least a list of all-time favorite maps, such as Mirage, Cobble, Vertigo, Dust2, Office, Inferno, Nuke, and Overpass. Most of the players just disconnect when the rotation goes to a more unpopular map, and the players are spread between the 4 groups, making less full matches and more undesirable experiences. The new group could be called Omega or something..
